upgrades.name: Advanced Medical Suite
upgrades.notes: If the crew contains a medic, it may re-roll a Survival roll for one soldier after each game.

upgrades.name: Armament Workshop
upgrades.notes: When successfully using the 'Armoury' power before a game, the crew can field 2 combat armours without paying the upkeep. Alternatively two weapons gain +1 dmg or one of each option is taken.

upgrades.name: Communications Array
upgrades.notes: Grants +2 to the activation roll for the 'Bribe' power.

upgrades.name: External Cargo Pods
upgrades.notes: Anytime the crew sells trade goods, it gets an extra 20% of the listed value.

upgrades.name: Extra Quarters
upgrades.notes: The crew may hire up to 5 Specialists instead of 4.

upgrades.name: Meditation Chamber
upgrades.notes: Grants +2 to the activation roll for the 'Mystic Trance' power.

upgrades.name: Robotics Workshop
upgrades.notes: Grants +1 to the activation roll for either the 'Create Robot', 'Remote Guidance' or 'Re-wire Robot' powers when used out of Game.

upgrades.name: Weapon Locker
upgrades.notes: One soldier gains a pistol, carbine or shotgun with +1 dmg before each game. This weapon is indestructible and takes up the soldiers gear slot.
